snippet: Police in Nassau County are trying to determine how John Capano, an off-duty agent with the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, died after intervening in a robbery.
abstract: Police in Nassau County are trying to determine how John Capano, an off-duty agent with the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, died after intervening in a robbery at a pharmacy in Seaford; they are considering possibility that Capano was killed by one of two other off-duty officers who arrived at scene after Capano chased suspect James McGoey out of building.

byline.original: By JOSEPH GOLDSTEIN and TIM STELLOH

lead_paragraph: Police in Nassau County are trying to determine how John Capano, an off-duty agent with the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives, died after intervening in a robbery.

headline.seo: A Routine Errand to Drugstore Turns Deadly
headline.main: As U.S. Agent Is Mourned, Officials Try to Figure Out Who Shot Him
headline.print_headline: As U.S. Agent Is Mourned, Officials Try to Figure Out Who Shot Him

keywords.value: Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco and Firearms
keywords.name: organizations
